data.eml:eml: Two new species of Yangisunda Zhang (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Zyginellini) from China, with a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin, Gao, Xia, Huang, Min (2011): Two new species of Yangisunda Zhang (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Zyginellini) from China, with a key to species. Zootaxa 3097: 45-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279128
